ValidationRule.description: When a DSR is' Closed' for Record Type Commercial Analytics Modelling then Outcome field cannot be null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator'), RecordType.DeveloperName ='Commercial_Analytics_Modelling', ISCHANGED(Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Closed'), ISBLANK( Outcome__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Outcome is required before changing the stage to Closed
